Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Centrally mediated cardiovascular effects of intracisternal application of carbachol in anesthetized rats .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cardiovascular effects |
| Anesthetized rats |

Note: "Centrally mediated cardiovascular effects" is not a disease, but rather a description of the effect of the application of carbachol on the cardiovascular system, which is mediated by the central nervous system. "Anesthetized rats" is also not a disease, but rather a description of the state of the rats in the experiment. Therefore, the only disease entity in the paragraph is "cardiovascular effects".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
